message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which is worth at least $8,000 to me. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,000. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the product is worth $8,000 to you, and I'm willing to pay up to $7,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $7,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $8,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let me know if you're interested.
